#include <stdio.h>
//#include <iostream>
#define ll unsigned long long int
ll solve(ll);
int main(){
    int T=0;
    
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--)
    {
      ll a=0;
      ll ans=0;
      scanf("%lld",&a);
      ans = solve(a);
      printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    
    return 0;
   // system("pause");
}

ll solve(ll a){
   ll count=0;
   while(a!=0)
   {
     if(a%2==1)
     count++;
     a/=2;
   }
   
   return count;
}
